name: Sushi Ninja (itch) (Fmlad)
description:
~ For Best experience play full screen using .Exe download ~

~ Update 3.6.2019 ~ v1.0.2 ~ 
- Fixed issue where successful mission was not counting!
- Lowered jumping sound effect

Submission for the MiniJam 29
Theme: Ninjas
Limitation: No Combat

Sushi Ninja!
Steal food from a moving conveyor while not being spotted! Satisfy your hunger. Click plates on the conveyor  to steal sushi deliciousness. (Buff and Debuffs were meant to be included however time restraint did not allow them to be in this current built)
Once done, deliver an important message in a scroll to your Sensai!
Thank you for taking the time to play my game. 

Coding: Fmlad  ( ~with help from Emma!)
Art/Animations: Fmlad
Music:
